main.name: Gamepad
main.tagline: Connect your gamepad to the Actions system.

inputMethods.Button1: Bottom button in right cluster (A / blue cross)
inputMethods.Button2: Right button in right cluster (B / red circle)
inputMethods.Button3: Left button in right cluster (X / pink square)
inputMethods.Button4: Top button in right cluster (Y / green triangle)
inputMethods.L1: Top left front button (Left shoulder / L1)
inputMethods.R1: Top right front button (Right shoulder /  R1)
inputMethods.L2: Bottom left front button (Left trigger / L2)
inputMethods.R2: Bottom right front button (Right trigger / R2)
inputMethods.Up: Top button in left cluster (directional pad)
inputMethods.Down: Bottom button in left cluster (directional pad)
inputMethods.Left: Left button in left cluster (directional pad)
inputMethods.Right: Right button in left cluster (directional pad)
inputMethods.LStickX: Horizontal axis for left stick (negative left/positive right)
inputMethods.LStickY: Vertical axis for left stick (negative up/positive down)
inputMethods.RStickX: Horizontal axis for right stick (negative left/positive right)
inputMethods.RStickY: Vertical axis for right stick (negative up/positive down)
